name: Emil's Mystery Pizza Delivery
description:
Emil's Pizza is famous in Little Bigtown. Only problem is their delivery... As a delivery messenger for Emil's Pizza, you are tasked with finding the correct house to deliver to. Unfortunately, Emil's instructions are... vague at best. Find your way around Little Bigtown and try to find the door you need to deliver to before the pizza gets cold. Call your boss if you get lost or need additional hints, but be warned, it decreases your bonus.

Controls:

- LMB - To Interact.
- Mouse - Look Around.
- [W], [A], [S], [D] - Move.
- [G] - Call Your Boss for a Hint!

Produced By:

BenignBrett
Kona (@TheKonadian1)
Winter (@winterdraws)
Yuzu (@yuzupup) -  http://its-yuz.us

for the 2021 Global Game Jam  (Theme: "Lost and Found")
